reviewText: Bad cause I couldn't watch any of the movies.
Make sure you read the description first! that was my mistake. It only works on certain DVD players...

Only reason why I'm giving this item 1 is because I can't give it no. Me personally I will never order anything from here again. I'm just going to get to the point I was out of $16 and some change out of $22.78. You make your own decisions when you buy an item. It don't work. You pay to send it back which cost $12.78. This is just my experiences.
